contracts.title: Decarbonisation - Roof-mounted solar PV arrays
contracts.description: Blackburn with Darwen Borough Council wishes to reduce the amount of grid electricity it has to purchase by generating its own energy from roof-mounted solar PV arrays.  Detailed design, installation, commissioning and maintenance of suitable PV arrays is required at 6 sites in Council ownership.
contracts.region: North West

contracts.title: Local Plan Climate Change and Natural Capital Study
contracts.description: Blackburn with Darwen Borough Council invited suitably qualified and experienced consultants to provide a quotation for completing an evidence base study relating to Climate Change and Natural Capital policy issues in support of the new Blackburn with Darwen Local Plan.
contracts.region: North West

contracts.title: Campus heating renewal
contracts.description:
Replacement of the existing heating system at Audley Community Primary School, Blackburn.  The main items of works are listed below:

•	The strip out and removal of the current heating system.
•	The installation of new boilers, distribution pipework and heat emitters to the Junior School.
•	The installation of new boilers, distribution pipework and heat emitters to the Infant School.
•	Related electrical and builders work to provide a complete working system
contracts.cpv_description: Heating equipment and Central-heating equipment and Heating, ventilation and air-conditioning installation work
contracts.region: North West

contracts.title: Blakey Moor Terrace Design Services
contracts.description:
Blackburn with Darwen Borough Council (BwDBC) is seeking to appoint a Design Team to: 
(i)	develop and deliver the project to redevelop and refurbish the Blakey Moor Terrace ( Nos. 11-27), in the centre of Blackburn
(ii)	with an option to support development of refurbishment and restoration schemes as required for private properties eligible for grant funding.
contracts.region: North West

contracts.title: Christmas Pantomime
contracts.description: Blackburn with Darwen Borough Council is looking to award a Contract for the provision of an experienced production company to work with the Council to produce an annual Pantomime over the next four years at King Georges Hall Blackburn
contracts.region: North West

contracts.title: Tyres and Associated services
contracts.description: Blackburn with Darwen Borough Council is looking to award a contract for the supply and fit of tyres and associated services for its fleet and the fleet of Rossendale Borough Council. The Councils have their own in house workshops and currently service and maintain approximately 250 vehicles, ranging from items of plant, trailers, horticultural machinery, passenger carrying vehicles, light commercial and heavy commercial vehicles.
contracts.region: North West

contracts.title: Blackburn with Darwen Borough Council are seeking to commission Self Directed Support Services DPS Framework.
contracts.description: Blackburn with Darwen Borough Council are seeking to commission a Self Directed Support Services Dynamic Purchasing System. To increase the uptake of direct payments, Blackburn with Darwen Borough Council requires effective, efficient and economical Direct Payment Support Services, to ensure flexible, high qualityprovision is available to recipients of direct payments. The role is to support, plan and enable people to direct their own support, as reflected in national and local strategic approac
contracts.region: North West

contracts.title: SOCIAL INTEGRATION PROGRAMME
contracts.description:
MHCLG's Integration Areas Programme aims to help build integrated communities, to better understand and tackle the challenges specific to a place, building on local strengths and also on what's been done well elsewhere. Blackburn with Darwen is one of five places selected to be the first national Integration Areas to take part in the programme.

Blackburn with Darwen Borough Council (The Council) is looking to award Contracts for the Provision of a Social Integration Programme split
contracts.cpv_description: E-learning services and Provision of language courses and Community action programme and Other services
contracts.region: North West
